Log in

May 2024
Zapier's Latest
Explore the latest updates, app news, and resources to bring more automation magic to your work.
Zapier Copilot
Meet Zapier Copilot: Build Zaps with AI
Copilot is your AI-powered automation assistant inside Zapier. Describe what you want to automate in a few sentences, and Copilot will create Zaps or custom actions for you. No automation experience required-just bring your ideas.
Get started
Zapier Central
Introducing the Zapier Central Chrome extension
Bring your personalized AI bots to your browser with Central's new Chrome extension. Ask your bot about any web page, work with page content, and work across 6,000+ apps.
Install for free
AI Updates
Automate your work with Google's Gemini 1.5 Flash model
Google's newest AI model is now available in our Google AI Studio integration. Learn how to recreate every example demoed at Google I/O.
Show me how
AI Updates
OpenAI's GPT-4o model is now available on Zapier
All the AI models! Our ChatGPT integration now supports the new GPT-4o model. Here are a few ideas to bring the power of GPT-4o into your Zaps.
Get inspired
Level up your automation
Webinar replay: Zapier AI Showcase
Learn AI automation strategies from real Zapier customers, and then put them into practice with our build-along session.
Catch the replay
Updated course: Increase your productivity with AI
Automating with AI feels like magic. This updated course will empower you to solve big automation challenges.
Take the course
Feature guide: AI at Zapier
Chatbots or Central? Canvas or Copilot? Learn which AI tools you should use (and when) to solve your business problems. Automation superpowers guaranteed.
Help me choose
Special offer: Use LinkedIn Conversions for free
Enjoy no task charges for using our LinkedIn Conversions integration in Zaps. Plus: Connect to Zapier within LinkedIn's Campaign Manager.
How it works
App Showcase
Airtable
It's easier than ever to organize anything with Airtable and Zapier. The Find Record search action now supports exact matches, giving you greater control over your Zaps.

Explore Airtable integrations
New and noteworthy apps
11 new integrations + 25 updates, including...
Snapchat Lead Ads
Automate lead capture from your Snapchat ads.
Explore Snapchat Lead Ads integrations
Pipedrive
Act on specific deal changes faster with the new Updated Deal trigger.
Explore Pipedrive integrations
Wix
Kick off your pre-made Wix workflows from a Zap with the new Wix Custom Triggers trigger.
Explore Wix integrations
PaintScout
Estimate paint jobs, close deals faster, and grow your services business.
Explore PaintScout integrations
RentCast
Research millions of property records in the United States and track your rental portfolio.
Explore RentCast integrations
Discover the latest
So many updates, so little space. Check out our Help Center for even more product updates.
Got a question? Send us a message
